channel.title: Best SUV Cars in India on GaadiKey Price List

item.title: Best SUV Cars Under 10 Lakhs
item.description: Planning to buy a brand new SUV under a budget of 10 lakhs? We have made a list of popular SUVs which are priced under the budget of 10 lakhs. SUV is the most preferred formfactor by Indian auto-enthusiasts, the compact SUV craze is catching up in India like a wildfire. In this list we have considered the ex-showroom price of all cars, the on-road price of the car with be 1-2 lakhs additional depending on the state which you live in.
